lines.line: Hello, are you okay?
Do I look okay? Those kids drive me crazy.
I'm sorry. It's just that I've lost her.
Lost who?
Fluffs, poor Fluffs. She never hurt anyone.
Who's Fluffs?
My beloved feline friend Fluffs. She's been purring by my side for almost a decade. Please, could you go search for her while I look over the kids?
Well, I suppose I could.
Really? Thank you so much! I really have no idea where she could be!
I think my sons, Shilop and Wilough, saw the cat last. They'll be out in the market place.
Alright then, I'll see what I can do.
Sorry, I'm too busy to play pet rescue.
Well, okay then. I'll have to find someone else.
Hello Gertrude.
Have you seen my poor Fluffs?
I'm afraid not.
What about Shilop?
No sign of him either.
Hmmm...strange, he should be at the market.
Hello there, I've been looking for you.
I didn't mean to take it! I just forgot to pay.
What? I'm trying to help your mum find Fluffs.
I might be able to help. Fluffs followed me to my secret play area, I haven't seen her since.
Ohh...well, in that case I might be able to help. Fluffs followed me to my secret play area, I haven't seen her since.
Where is this play area?
If I told you that, it wouldn't be a secret.
Tell me sonny, or I will hurt you.
W..wh..what?! Y..you wouldn't! A young lad like me! I'd have you behind bars before nightfall!
What will make you tell me?
Well...now you ask, I am a bit short on cash.
How much?
10 coins.
10 coins?!
I'll handle this.
100 coins should cover it.
100 coins! Why should I pay you?
You shouldn't, but we won't help otherwise. We never liked that cat anyway, so what do you say?
I'm not paying you a penny.
Okay then, I'll find another way to make money.
Okay then, I'll pay.
There you go, now where did you see Fluffs?
I play at an abandoned lumber mill to the north east. Just beyond the Jolly Boar Inn. I saw Fluffs running around in there.
Anything else?
Well, you'll have to find the broken fence to get in. I'm sure you can manage that.
Well, never mind, it's Fluffs' loss.
I'm sure my mum will get over it.
Where did you say you saw Fluffs?
Weren't you listening? I saw the flea bag in the old lumber mill just north east of here. Just walk past the Jolly Boar Inn and you should find it.
Hello again, did you manage to find Shilop? I can't keep an eye on him for the life of me.
He does seem quite a handful.
You have no idea! Did he help at all?
I think so, I'm just going to look now.
Thanks again, adventurer.
Mew!
Miaoww
Hisss!
Ouch!
Mew!
Hello again.
You think you're tough do you?
Pardon?
I can beat anyone up!
He can you know!
Really?
Hello. How's it going? Any luck?
Yes, I've found Fluffs!
Well well, you are clever! Did you bring her back?
Well, that's the thing, she refuses to leave.
Oh dear, oh dear! Maybe she's just hungry. She loves doogle sardines but I'm all out.
Doogle sardines?
Yes, raw sardines seasoned with doogle leaves. Unfortunately I've used all my doogle leaves, but you may find some in the woods out back.
Hi!
Hey traveller, did Fluffs eat the sardines?
Yeah, she loved them, but she still won't leave.
Well that is strange, there must be a reason.
Purr...
Purr...
Hello Gertrude. Fluffs ran off with her kitten.
You're back! Thank you! Thank you! Fluffs just came back! I think she was just upset as she couldn't find her kitten.
If you hadn't found her kitten it would have died out there!
That's okay, I like to do my bit.
I don't know how to thank you. I have no real material possessions. I do have kittens! I can only really look after one.
Well, if it needs a home.
I would sell it to my cousin in West Ardougne. I hear there's a rat epidemic there. But it's too far.
Here you go, look after her and thank you again!
Oh by the way, the kitten can live in your backpack, but to make it grow you must take it out and feed and stroke it often.

characters.name: Gertrude
characters.description: Middle-aged female, British accent, warm but weary tone. A busy single mother and housewife in Varrock who is caring and affectionate towards her cat Fluffs, but often exasperated by her mischievous children.

characters.name: Shilop
characters.description: Young boy around 8-10 years old, British accent, cheeky and mischievous tone. One of Gertrude's sons who hangs around Varrock market, tends to get into trouble and boasts about being tough.

characters.name: Wilough
characters.description: Young boy around 10-12 years old, British accent, cunning and opportunistic tone. The more scheming of Gertrude's sons who tries to extort money from people and acts as the ringleader of his siblings.

characters.name: Fluffs
characters.description: Female cat, soft meowing and hissing sounds. Gertrude's beloved pet cat who has been with her for almost a decade, protective mother to her kitten.

characters.name: Fluffs' kitten
characters.description: Baby kitten, high-pitched soft mewing sounds. A tiny newborn kitten belonging to Fluffs, innocent and helpless.
